alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Rutherford; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:31AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern De Kalb, Rutherford, northern Coffee, Warren, northern Bedford and Cannon Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Murfreesboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Shelbyville, McMinnville, Smithville, Woodbury, Walterhill, Morrison, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Liberty, Auburntown, Centertown, Viola, Lascassas, Christiana, Rock Island State Park, Beechgrove, Fosterville, Summitville and Deason. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 76 and 107. Interstate 840 between mile markers 55 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Rutherford; Warren
